overview:
Tony Bain is the founder of Tony Bain Group (TBG). TBG is a company that invests in early stage software companies with a core focus on the field of data management. Products he has been involved in include the RockSolid automated management suite (Red Rock) and technologies being invested in by TBG include SQLThunder data cache and SQLRelease schema management tool.

Tony runs a blog where writes posts describing new innovations in the area of data management. He has also co-authored 5 books and he is also a frequent speaker at industry events such as Microsoft Tech Ed.

Tony has also worked in a consultative capacity to the tech Venture Capital industry, providing independent technical review and analysis on potential investments.
